original_text: And they spake against the God of Jerusalem, as against the gods of the people of the earth, which were the work of the hands of man.
korean_text: 그들이 예루살렘의 하나님을 비방하기를 사람의 손으로 지은 세상 사람의 신들을 비방하듯 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And they spake against the God of Jerusalem
as against the gods of the people of the earth
which were the work of the hands of man
